code: import React from'react';import{STATUS}from"../../utils/status";import"./Category.scss";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Error from'../Error/Error';import Loader from'../Loader/Loader';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Category=function Category(_ref){var categories=_ref.categories,status=_ref.status;if(status===STATUS.ERROR)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{});if(status===STATUS.LOADING)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"categories py-5 bg-ghost-white",id:"categories",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"categories-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-uppercase fw-7 text-regal-blue ls-1",children:"Categorys"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-items grid",children:categories.slice(0,5).map(function(category){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"category/".concat(category.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-item-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:category.image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-item-name text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"fs-20",children:category.name})})]})},category.id);})})]})})});};export default Category;
